articles.author: Dr. Marc Siegel, opinion contributor
articles.title: What we dread with the Coronavirus versus what could actually happen
articles.description: Good public health precautions, vaccines and effective treatments are all antidotes to our coronavirus fears.
articles.content:
There are no masks, no obvious viruses and no storm clouds in sunny Miami Beach. From here, it is hard to believe that a new pandemic is coming and and, in fact, it may or may not be. But the not-knowing worries us. 
The director of the U.S. Centers for Dise… [+4712 chars]
